author: Suzanne Lynch
title: Coronavirus: Spain’s death toll rises again, Trump threatens to withhold WHO funding
description: Italy’s Lombardy province offers glimmer of hope as Wuhan city reopens
content:
US president Donald Trump has threatened to withhold money pledged to the World Health Organisation over its handling of coronavirus, as he accused the global body of being very China-centric.
They called it wrong, he said of the coronavirus that has claimed… [+6235 chars]
